# **Dr. Fatih Uenal**
### *Postdoctoral Researcher* {style="padding-top: 0px;"}

Last updated: `r Sys.Date()`


Currently, I am working as a Postdoctoral Researcher & Data Scientist at the [Cambridge Social Decision-Making Lab](https://www.sdmlab.psychol.cam.ac.uk/) (University of Cambridge, UK). I am passionate about data-driven knowleddge production  with a specific focus on phenomena such as climate change, environmentalism, Islamophobia, racism, sexism, and speciesism. I am analyzing these topics from social and evolutionary psychological perspectives. 

My reesearch has been featured in the [Washington Post](https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/europe/at-a-site-of-nazi-terror-muslim-refugees-reckon-with-germanys-past/2017/08/10/12e2c864-779b-11e7-8c17-533c52b2f014_story.html), [Die Welt](https://www.welt.de/politik/deutschland/plus197864753/Juden-und-Muslime-Quelle-des-Antisemitismus-hat-sich-gewandelt.html) and other outlets.

If you are interested in my research, please visit my academic [website](https://scholar.harvard.edu/fatih-uenal) and my [ResearchGate Profile](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Fatih_Uenal).
